name: Shuang Qiu
content: Shuang Qiu Shuang Qiu I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Systems Engineering and Department of Computer Science (secondary) at City University of Hong Kong since 2025. Prior to CityU, I did research in the Department of Mathematics at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology as a research assistant professor working with Prof. Tong Zhang (å¼ æ½¼) and in the Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago as a postdoc researcherÂ  working with Prof. Mladen Kolar and Prof. Zhaoran Wang. I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor advised by Prof. Jieping Ye (å¶æ°å¹³). We offer a special PhD application track for applicants with a bachelorâ€™s degree from C9 League, UCAS, and QS/THE Top 20 universities, featuring an expedited offer process and a much higher scholarship. Welcome eligible applicants to get in touch with me as soon as possible! C9 League: THU, PKU, SJTU, FDU, ZJU, NJU, USTC, XJTU, HIT (ğŸŒŸ Available!) We offer a joint PhD program for Ph.D. students from UCAS, FDU, ZJU, NJU, USTC, XJTU, and HIT. Welcome eligible applicants to get in touch with me as soon as possible! If you have a background in or are passionate about both applied and theoretical aspects of the following topics: Agentic AI (Multimodal) Large Language Model Reasoning Embodied AI Reinforcement Learning please do not hesitate to contact me (shuanqiu [AT] cityu [DOT] edu [DOT] hk) with your CV and transcript. (ğŸŒŸ Available!) 10/2025 ğŸ‰ Great honor to be a recipient of the Best Area Chair Award for the Chinese Conference on Pattern Recognition and Computer Vision, the largest and most comprehensive conference on pattern recognition and computer vision in China 09/2025 ğŸ“ƒ We release our world model work LatticeWorld for building an industry-grade 3D world with multimodal LLMs. Check out this demo! 09/2025 ğŸ‰ I will be serving as Area Chair of ICLR 2026 08/2025 ğŸ‰ Great honor to receive research funding from renowned VC MiraclePlus (å¥‡ç»©åˆ›å›) to support our research on Agentic AI and LLMs. 07/2025 ğŸ‰ I will be serving as Senior PC of AAAI 2026 Research Interest My recent research interests generally focus on sequential decision-making problems and their applications in Agentic AI, Large Language Models, and Embodied AI. Specifically, my research interest include both applications and theories of reinforcement learning, game theory, large language models, robotics, AI agents, diffusion models, and nonconvex optimization.
